| History                 = '''Pluto''' was created by the [[Maggia (Earth-616)|Maggia]] as their covert banking network, as well as the banking for many criminal enterprises. During the wedding between two Maggia heirs, [[Pluto (Manhattan)|Pluto]] was robbed by [[Felicia Hardy (Earth-616)|Black Cat]] and [[Black Cat's Gang (Earth-616)|her crew]]. Despite the chase, Pluto was unable to regain their stolen losses.{{r|Black Cat Annual Vol 1 1}} A month later, [[Peter Parker (Earth-616)|Spider-Man]] publicly robbed a New York bank front belonging to Pluto to confiscate the contents of a safety deposit box that connected to [[Dmitri Smerdyakov (Earth-616)|Chameleon]]'s [[Arms Race|sales]] of black market [[Strategic Homeland Intervention, Enforcement and Logistics Division (Earth-616)|S.H.I.E.L.D.]] tech. Following the defeat of Pluto members chasing Spider-Man, [[John Jonah Jameson (Earth-616)|J. Jonah Jameson]] posted an online article detailing their operation on the [[Threats and Menaces (Earth-616)|TnM]] website.{{r|Amazing Spider-Man Vol 5 38}}
